name: Magic Shooter (itch) (Amauri)
description:
Description

This game was made inspired by an existing game model, but with the theme of mages.

A project I started from 0 to learn all about game development and going through each of the steps, and mainly to master my programming skills.

The best way to learn to program and face a real challenge, from there you research, research, research, cry, research and then learn a method to solve it, and it repeats...

Follow Me

Insta: @araujo.mayc

Dev Insta: @amauriidev

Feedback

Feel free to comment what you liked and disliked about the game, and what improvements you think would be nice to add.
